h3.PhysicalProperties

*countAs* < string >
-	What this physical property is treated as for FX/Civ/Etc.

*Reverb* < float >
-	How much this material occludes reverb reflections

*Dampen* < float >
-	How much this material occludes sound

*Restitution* < float >
-	[0.0 - 1.0] How much this material bounces in a physics simulation

*SFriction* < float >
-	[0.0 - Inf] Static friction is how hard it is to move an object when it is still. Values above 1.0 mean very sticky objects.

*DFriction* < float >
-	[0.0 - 1.0] Dynamic friction is how hard it is to move an object when it is moving

*Civilian*
-	Which types of civilians can walk on this
